definition[0]: an area where there is a lot of support for a particular way of life, political party etc
example[0]: The area is a Republican stronghold.
definition[1]: an area that is strongly defended by a military group
example[1]: The fighters moved south to their mountain stronghold.
definition[2]: an area where there are large numbers of a rare animal
example[2]: one of the last strongholds of the European wolf
